rounds.motion: This House believes that social media platforms should be held legally responsible for the mental health impacts of their algorithms
rounds.team_feedback: Strong opening with novel arguments. Good coordination between speakers. Could improve on time management and POI handling.

rounds.motion: This House would ban all forms of genetic enhancement in humans
rounds.team_feedback: Excellent rebuttals and strategic positioning. Improved teamwork and better use of evidence. Strong closing arguments.

rounds.motion: This House believes that developing countries should prioritize economic growth over environmental protection
rounds.team_feedback: Good individual performances but lacked strategic coordination. Arguments were sound but didn't effectively counter government's framework.

rounds.motion: This House would require all political advertisements to be fact-checked by independent bodies before publication
rounds.team_feedback: Outstanding performance. Clear definition, strong case building, and excellent teamwork. Best round so far with confident delivery.

strengths: Good use of evidence and examples
